verse.name: i1
verse.lines:
Oh oh oh oh oh oh oh oh
Oh oh oh oh oh oh

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Lord I’m ready for the power
Miracle working power
Let Your power flow
As we worship you today
Lord I’m ready for the fire
Chain breaking fire
Let Your fire fall
As we worship you today

verse.name: c1
verse.lines:
You are
Reliable
Dependable
Unchangeable
Unfailing
Faithful
Beautiful
That is who You are yeah ah ha

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Lord I’m ready for the power
Miracle working power
Let Your power flow
As we worship at Your feet

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
Lord I’m ready for the fire Lord I’m ready for the fire
Chains breaking fire
Let Your fire fall Lord let Your fire fall
As we worship as we worship at Your feet

verse.name: v4
verse.lines:
Lord I’m ready for the power
Wonder working power
Let it fall Lord let Your power flow yes Lord
As we worship at Your feet

verse.name: v5
verse.lines:
Lord I’m ready Lord I'm ready for the fire yeah eh eh eh
Destiny changing fire
Let You fire fall Lord let Your fire fall
As we worship as we worship at Your feet
